title: What does laughter mean in non-verbal hypnosis? Demonstration & explanation with Dr. Paret / Part 2
description:
This is the second part of this video series. The previous part, you can watch here: https://youtu.be/57kKbC7zlEs Dr. Paret hypnotizes one of his students on his masterclass. He uses only fascination - the power of the gaze, but eventually the subject enters in a very deep trance. The woman loses control over her emotions and starts laughing. After a few moments, she starts crying, as she goes through different passages of the hypnotic trance. Dr. Paret demonstrates and explains why this reaction occurs.
